    Recipe row helper for Shaped Recipes
    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecipeRow

        public RecipeRow(java.lang.String shape,
                 Item[] items)
        Constructs a new RecipeRow
        Parameters:
        shape - the shape of the recipe, use spaces for empty slots, maximum of 3 characters.
        items - the Items in the row, item index should match the character's first appearance index ignoring spaces.
        Example: (underscore used to show spaces clearer)
        shape = "X_Y", items = new Item[]{ itemA, itemB }, itemA = X and itemB = Y
        or shape = "__X", items = new Item[]{ itemA }, itemA = X
        or shape = "YYY", items = new Item[]{ itemA }, since its all Y only 1 item needed
